data.title: 235 Best “Never Have I Ever” Questions That Dig Deep
data.meta_description: Sleepovers, group dinners, free time between classes—we pulled together a ton of Never Have I Ever questions to help you get to know your friends a bit better. Read more.
data.text:
Looking for the best “Never Have I Ever" questions to level up your next group hang? This slumber party classic is perfect for a real-life or Zoom game — and we've done the work for you of whipping up some good “Never Have I Ever” questions that are perfect for getting your friends to spill. (Because, let’s be honest, secret swapping is the real reason we play this game.) Whether you’re looking for funny “Never Have I Ever” ideas or you’re the type of person who sticks to tell-all truth questions when playing Truth or Dare, you’ll find what you need below for a round that’s as fun as it is revealing. All you have to do is play!

How to Play Never Have I Ever

Speaking of playing, if you need a refresher, here are the “Never Have I Ever" game rules. To start off, every player holds up their hands with all 10 fingers showing. Then, you’ll go around and take turns reading off a “Never Have I Ever” from the list. As the person reading, you’ll need to choose a thing you actually haven’t done yourself — feel free to skip around the list, or substitute in some good “Never Have I Ever” questions of your own. Every time a player has, in fact, done one of the things mentioned, they must put a finger down. The person with the last finger standing wins!

The Best Times to Play Never Have I Ever

Like with most things, there’s a time and a place for a game like this. Is it an ice breaker for a professional setting, like, say, a meet and greet with a new coworker? Maybe not, unless you’re really close. Never Have I Ever is a perfect party game because you can play with as many people as you want. In fact, the more the merrier. It’s also great for small groups, maybe a sleepover with your closest friends or as a tool for killing time on an especially long road trip.

It’s a great game to play with family, too, on vacations or while you’re gathered together for the holidays. Just make sure you keep it clean and you don’t ask anything you actually wouldn’t want to share with your parents or siblings. Make sure you really think about the best Never Have I Ever questions for a family setting before jumping into the deep end.

Best Never Have I Ever Questions

Never Have I ever is a very situational game, which can make it tough to put together a tidy curation of the very best questions to ask. Instead, think of the first few queries as a vibe check of sorts. These are the questions that you can ask a wide range of people, from parents and coworkers to best friends and romantic partners. If anything, they’re great conversation starters. Here are some Never Have I Ever examples to get the group going.

Never have I ever broken a bone.

Never have I ever Googled myself.

Never have I ever traveled solo.

Never have I ever seen a ghost.

Never have I ever toilet-papered someone's house.

Never have I ever laughed so hard I spit out my drink.

Never have I ever pretended to be on the phone.

Never have I ever met a celebrity.

Never have I ever sleepwalked.

Never have I ever read an entire book in a day.

Never have I ever gone to a party I wasn’t invited to.

Never have I ever stayed up all night.

Now, onto the questions! In this article you’ll find:

Never Have I Ever Questions: Juicy

Never Have I Ever Questions: Funny

Never Have I Ever Questions for Friends

Never Have I Ever Questions for Your Crush

Never Have I Ever Questions: Spicy Edition

Juicy Never Have I Ever Questions

Reserve these for your closest of buddies—or someone you want to bring into that circle. These are guaranteed to be some spicy “put a finger down” questions.

1. Never have I ever gone skinny dipping.

2. Never have I ever gone on a blind date.

3. Never have I ever creeped an ex on social media.

4. Never have I ever been hungover.

5. Never have I ever kissed my best friend.

6. Never have I ever ghosted someone.

7. Never have I ever gotten a speeding ticket.

8. Never have I ever slid into someone's DMs.

9. Never have I ever dined and dashed.

10. Never have I ever used a fake ID.

11. Never have I ever had a crush on a teacher.

12. Never have I ever been in love.

13. Never have I ever made out in a public place.

14. Never have I ever gotten into a physical fight.

15. Never have I ever had an alcoholic drink.

16. Never have I ever played spin the bottle.

17. Never have I ever snooped through someone's phone.

18. Never have I ever snuck into a movie theater.

19. Never have I ever kissed a friend's ex.

20. Never have I ever told someone "I love you" without meaning it.

21. Never have I ever been called a player.

22. Never have I ever smoked a cigarette.

23. Never have I ever given a lap dance.

24. Never have I ever gotten a lap dance.

25. Never have I ever cheated on a test.

26. Never have I ever used a dating app.

27. Never have I ever kissed more than one person in 24 hours.

28. Never have I ever cheated on someone.

29. Never have I ever been cheated on.

30. Never have I ever sent a racy text to the wrong person.

31. Never have I ever had a negative bank account balance.

32. Never have I ever played strip poker.

33. Never have I ever been arrested.

34. Never have I ever been expelled.

35. Never have I ever stolen anything.

36. Never have I ever gotten a hickey.

37. Never have I ever been fired.

38. Never have I ever made out in a movie theater.

39. Never have I ever dated someone older than me.

40. Never have I ever dated someone younger than me.

41. Never have I ever broken the law.

42. Never have I ever been to a nude beach.

43. Never have I stood a date up.

44. Never have I ever stayed in a relationship that I really wasn’t feeling.

45. Never have I ever given someone a fake phone number.

46. Never have I ever lied to someone in this room.

47. Never have I ever broken up with someone over text.

48. Never have I ever had a crush on an SO’s best friend.

49. Never have I ever shoplifted.

50. Never have I ever seen a ghost.

51. Never have I told a secret I wasn’t supposed to share.

52. Never have I ever had a friend with benefits.

53. Never have I ever intentionally started a fight between other people.

54. Never have I ever dated more than one person at once.

55. Never have I ever spent money that wasn’t mine to spend.

56. Never have I ever had a relationship last less than a month.

57. Never have I ever had a relationship last longer than a year.

58. Never have I ever gotten an unexpected piercing.

59. Never have I ever found a dumb excuse to text an ex.

60. Never have I ever fallen in love at first sight.

61. Never have I ever kissed someone I just met.

62. Never have I ever kept a crush secret from people in this room.

63. Never have I ever been in love with someone without them knowing.

64. Never have I ever been in an open relationship.

65. Never have I ever fantasized about getting back with an ex.

66. Never have I ever helped a friend lie by being their alibi.

67. Never have I ever seriously thought about marrying someone.

68. Never have I ever had a totally online relationship.

69. Never have I ever flirted just to get something I wanted.

70. Never have I ever tried guessing someone’s password.

71. Never have I ever been caught lying.

72. Never have I ever catfished someone.

73. Never have I ever gone streaking.

Funny Never Have I Ever Questions

If you’re looking for questions that will very likely lead to some hilarious stories, you’ve found the right place.

1. Never have I ever farted in front of a significant other.

2. Never have I ever peed in the shower.

3. Never have I ever peed in a pool.

4. Never have I ever eaten a carton of ice cream.

5. Never have I ever cheated in a board game.

6. Never have I ever cheated in a card game.

7. Never have I ever screamed during a scary movie.

8. Never have I ever laughed so hard I spit out my drink.

9. Never have I ever been sent to the principal's office.

10. Never have I ever clogged a toilet.

11. Never have I ever toilet-papered someone's house.

12. Never have I ever worn something I took out of my dirty laundry.

13. Never have I ever vomited after a roller coaster ride.

14. Never have I ever watched an entire television series in a day.

15. Never have I ever said “I love you” to someone by accident.

16. Never have I ever walked in on my parents having sex.

17. Never have I ever lied while playing this game.

18. Never have I ever Googled myself.

19. Never have I ever had a pet name for an SO.

20. Never have I ever been given a pet name by an SO.

21. Never have I ever had a dirty dream about a super unexpected person.

22. Never have I ever been accused of sharing too much on social media.

23. Never have I ever created a fake social media account.

24. Never have I ever run out of gas while driving.

25. Never have I ever gone to a party I wasn’t invited to.

26. Never have I ever dated someone super annoying only because they’re cute.

27. Never have I ever lied on a first date.

28. Never have I ever used someone else's toothbrush.

29. Never have I ever pretended to be on the phone.

30. Never have I ever enjoyed a smell I’m supposed to find gross.

31. Never have I ever been on TV for an embarrassing reason.

32. Never have I ever gone several days without showering.

33. Never have I ever turned my underwear inside out so I don’t have to wash it.

34. Never have I ever lied about what I was doing on social media.

35. Never have I ever been told I snore loudly.

Best Never Have I Ever Questions for Friends

Feel free to get a bit deep when you’re surrounded by friendly faces—and the promise that whatever is shared in the circle of Never Have I Ever will not be broadcasted.

1. Never have I ever had a crush on a friend's sibling.

2. Never have I ever eaten a carton of ice cream.

3. Never have I ever gone commando.

4. Never have I ever shaved my head.

5. Never have I ever gotten a tattoo.

6. Never have I ever broken a bone.

7. Never have I ever been to a bachelorette party or bachelor party.

8. Never have I ever gotten heated during a family game night.

9. Never have I ever met a celebrity.

10. Never have I ever had a surprise party thrown for me.

11. Never have I ever traveled solo.

12. Never have I ever eaten whipped cream straight out of the can.

13. Never have I ever auditioned for a reality television show.

14. Never have I ever told my parents I was staying at a friend's house but was really somewhere else.

15. Never have I ever been to a psychic.

16. Never have I ever lived alone.

17. Never have I ever sang karaoke.

18. Never have I ever stayed overnight in the hospital.

19. Never have I ever deleted a post because it didn't get enough likes.

20. Never have I ever stayed up all night.

21. Never have I ever been on a cruise.

22. Never have I ever lost a bet.

23. Never have I ever gotten in a car accident.

24. Never have I ever rode a motorcycle.

25. Never have I ever pretended to be sick to get out of school.

26. Never have I ever beaten a video game.

27. Never have I ever cried at school.

28. Never have I ever talked to a family member about my sex life.

29. Never have I ever been to Mexico.

30. Never have I ever eaten caviar.

31. Never have I ever used someone else's Netflix password.

32. Never have I ever fallen asleep in class.

33. Never have I ever dyed my hair.

34. Never have I ever read an entire book in a day.

35. Never have I ever seen an alligator in real life.

36. Never have I ever re-gifted a gift.

37. Never have I ever sleepwalked.

38. Never have I ever gone snowboarding.

39. Never have I ever been awake for 48 hours (or more) straight.

40. Never have I ever broken up with someone in a way I regret.

41. Never have I ever fainted.

42. Never have I ever had a fight with a SO in public.

43. Never have I ever knowingly spread a rumor.

44. Never have I ever cried at school.

45. Never have I ever been somewhere I was sure was haunted.

46. Never have I ever cut my own hair.

47. Never have I ever lied to get out of plans with friends.

Best Never Have I Ever Questions for Your Crush

If someone you like is in on the game, consider this a fact-finding mission. Sure, you could stick to the juicy questions to ask your crush, but you’ll find more ahead that will help you make an impression.

1. Never have I ever sent a cute morning text.

2. Never have I ever broken someone’s heart.

3. Never have I ever given a massage.

4. Never have I ever fallen out of love.

5. Never have I ever received a love letter.

6. Never have I ever used a pick-up line.

7. Never have I ever dated someone for their looks.

8. Never have I ever left someone on “read.”

9. Never have I ever regretted something.

10. Never have I ever wished I was famous.

11. Never have I ever helped a stranger.

12. Never have I ever gotten bored of a relationship.

13. Never have I ever broken a promise.

14. Never have I ever fallen in love with a fictional character.

15. Never have I ever felt nervous in front of someone in this room.

16. Never have I ever wanted to go skydiving.

Never Have I Ever Questions: Spicy Edition

We’ve all been faced with a spicy question. It’s the kind of query that makes you giggle (in an apprehensive way), sweat a little bit, and stumble over your words. Reserve these questions for those moments at the sleepover or hangout when the crowd has thinned and things are getting a little juicier. And yes, we know we have a section full of juicy questions, but these go a level deeper.

1. Never have I ever had a crush on someone in this room.

2. Never have I ever lied to my best friend.

3. Never have I ever copied someone else’s homework.

4. Never have I ever secretly dated a friend’s ex.

5. Never have I ever kissed a friend.

6. Never have I ever lied to a friend to get out of a hangout.

7. Never have I ever stolen something from a friend’s house.

8. Never have I ever made up a rumor about a friend.

9. Never have I ever gone streaking.

10. Never have I ever had a near-death experience.

11. Never have I ever punched someone.

12. Never have I ever had an epiphany.

13. Never have I ever been jealous of someone else’s success.

14. Never have I ever doubted science.

15. Never have I ever said I love you and not meant it.

16. Never have I ever sent a dirty text message.

17. Never have I ever kissed a stranger.

18. Never have I ever worn a thong.

19. Never have I ever watched porn.

20. Never have I ever played strip poker.

21. Never have I ever bought lingerie.

22. Never have I ever looked up an ex online.

23. Never have I ever used a fake ID.

24. Never have I ever received a dirty text.

25. Never have I ever sent an anonymous love letter.

26. Never have I ever tried naked yoga.

27. Never have I ever had a dream come true.

28. Never have I ever accomplished all of my new year’s eve goals.

29. Never have I ever committed a crime.

30. Never have I ever participated in a talent show.

31. Never have I ever walked in on someone in the bathroom.

32. Never have I ever gone on a group date.

33. Never have I ever walked into a glass door.

34. Never have I ever fallen asleep while on the phone with someone.

35. Never have I ever eaten something after dropping it on the ground.

36. Never have I ever been caught in a lie.

37. Never have I ever had Brazilian wax.

38. Never have I ever taken a piece of someone’s clothing.

39. Never have I ever faked interest in a conversation.

40. Never have I ever pretended to agree with someone to avoid an argument.

41. Never have I ever done something just to impress someone else.

42. Never have I ever given up something I love for another person.

43. Never have I ever kept a secret from a best friend.

44. Never have I ever been ashamed of a best friend.

45. Never have I ever hated someone in my family.

46. Never have I ever lied about being ok.

47. Never have I ever thought about a partner as a burden.

48. Never have I ever forgotten my best friend’s birthday.

49. Never have I ever signed up for a gym membership because of a crush.

50. Never have I ever asked someone to do something they really didn’t want to do.

51. Never have I ever forgotten a dating anniversary.

52. Never have I ever stalked someone’s Instagram account.

53. Never have I ever ruined dinner on purpose.

54. Never have I ever called my boyfriend/girlfriend the wrong name.

55. Never have I ever serenaded someone.

56. Never have I ever written a love poem.

57. Never have I ever made a massive mess while babysitting and blamed it on the kids.

58. Never have I ever been embarrassed by a date.

59. Never have I ever thrown up on a date.

60. Never have I ever fallen out of a boat.
